channel.title: flowers on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in flowers on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.16: Barcelona on my mind
item.description: 5th May, 2011 Hello, Tonight I sleep in Bremen Airport to be on time for a very early morning flight to Barcelona where I will meet two of my close friends from my year in Edinburgh … it will be one of their birthdays during the weekend when we will be there and we will be staying with the kind hospitality of the other’s brother.

item.title: LOG 1.13: Spring 'time', German and the 60´s
item.description: 31st March, 2011 After some rain last night, the air smells like monsoon in India; so fresh and clean! I´ve opened the window to let it come in and along with it are the chirps and tweets of the birds.

item.title: LOG 1.10: The first signs
item.description: 28th February, 2011 Hello, It is now possible to see the first signs of Spring. The trees are bearing buds that will leaf and flower forth.

item.title: LfE 23: Spring in full swing
item.description: 05/04/2010 Hello everyone, We passed the Equinox on the 21st of March. We celebrated and welcomed spring in full swing. Daffodils now grow where the White and purple flowers did.

item.title: LfE 21: Season of Life… Under my Skin
item.description: 03/03/2010 Hello everyone, I’m halfway through my stay here in Edinburgh and every day brings me closer to the day I can come back home to Bangalore and hug my family.

item.title: Flakes
item.description: Written in Feb 2007 The season changes Clouds cover parts of The sky. I lose peace. Moisture in the wind Falling leaves; dry and Brittle. Wait for rain.
